task: navigate out of listbox popup by moving editing cursor to beginning of textbox
setup_script_description: expands the combobox,  sets the combobox value to 'Alabama', places focus on that option in the listbox popup and positions the editing cursor at the end of the textbox
specific_user_instruction: With focus on an option in the listbox popup, navigate back to the textbox by moving the editing cursor to the beginning of the text.
